function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Static data collection in simulation model","Impact":"Decreased accuracy of model due to lack of dynamic real-time adaptation","Mitigation":"Implement dynamic data collection and real-time adaptation in simulation model","Technologies":"Real-time data collection and integration, dynamic modeling software","People":"Researchers, simulation model developers","Owner":"Research institutions, simulation modeling teams"},{"Description":"Creation of multiple queues in simulation model","Impact":"Decreased efficiency of the entire process due to multiple queues","Mitigation":"Implement a more efficient queuing system or optimize resource allocation in simulation model","Technologies":"Queue management algorithms, resource allocation optimization software","People":"Simulation model developers, healthcare process managers","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, simulation modeling teams"},{"Description":"Lack of dynamic real-time adaptation in simulation models","Impact":"Decreased accuracy and relevance of the model to real-world events","Mitigation":"Incorporate digital twin concept for real-time adaptation in simulation model","Technologies":"Digital twin technology, IoT sensors, real-time data integration software","People":"Researchers, simulation model developers","Owner":"Research institutions, simulation modeling teams"}]}
